name: Escape the House of Hell
description:
Escape the House of Hell is new interactive, point and click adventure set inside a haunted manor.

You wake up alone in a scary haunted house. Can you find a way to escape the mysterious haunted manor which you suddenly find yourself stranded in? Was it an accident that you find yourself trapped in a haunted room or a cruel twist of fate? How do you escape? Will the adventure ever end?

Follow the story and explore the haunted manor with intuitive point and click controls and beautiful 3D graphics. It is important that you investigate everything – even the smallest detail with help you to can unravel the mystery!

Enjoy the adventure and captivate your imagination – what would you do if you were stranded inside a haunted house?

FEATURES:
• Simple, intuitive point and click tap-to-play gameplay
• Beautiful 3D, original graphics with over 70 interactive scenes
• Captivating and unique story – excite your imagination!
• Future updates to improve play and interactive new elements
• Compatible with all devices

Escape the House of Hell is one of a number of adventures.

Thanks for supporting original, British made, independent game development – your feedback is much appreciated!
